about_the_game:
You're not out of breath already, are you? Look, the monsters are hot on your tail!
This is no time to slack off!
Never fear! With this DLC, you can sprint indefinitely!

[Implementing the DLC]
After purchasing this DLC, the new item "Infinite Dash" will be added to the Settings menu on the title screen. Turn this on to apply this DLC.


DLC is provided purely for the purposes of enjoyment, and as a means
for users to support the game's developers. It is not needed to clear the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains scenes of blood and violence.
Care has been taken with the depiction of grotesque imagery to avoid the representation of amputated limbs, etc.

detailed_description:
You're not out of breath already, are you? Look, the monsters are hot on your tail!
This is no time to slack off!
Never fear! With this DLC, you can sprint indefinitely!

DLC is provided purely for the purposes of enjoyment, and as a means

name: 【QuietMansion1】Infinite Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1 / Windows10 / Windows11
  • Processor: Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel / AMD / NVIDIA
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1 / Windows10 / Windows11
  • Processor: Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel / AMD / NVIDIA
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: For the speed freaks among you, this is your chance! Outrun the terrible monsters and set new speed records!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English*, French*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
